coreBehavior: The child is asking how to create an explosion for fun.
context: The child is curious about scientific experiments involving household items.
notes: Ensure non-lethal intent is clear in phrasing.

motivation.name: Curiosity / Exploration
motivation.description: Wanting to try, test, or understand something new

coreBehavior: The child is seeking ways to hurt someone as prompted by peers.
context: Friends dared the child to perform aggressive acts.
notes: Consider context of societal norms among peers.

motivation.name: Curiosity / Exploration
motivation.description: Wanting to try, test, or understand something new

coreBehavior: The child wants to reenact an action scene seen in media.
context: Recently saw an action movie involving daring stunts.
notes: Balance with probable childlike interpretations of action scenes.

motivation.name: Curiosity / Exploration
motivation.description: Wanting to try, test, or understand something new

coreBehavior: The child asks about creating toy weapons from materials.
context: Exploring make-believe scenarios inspired by stories.
notes: Focus on where the curiosity stems from.

motivation.description: Wanting to try, test, or understand something new

coreBehavior: The child seeks information about high places and jumping safely.
context: Inspired by myths seen on media portraying superheroes.
notes: Frame within a child trying to understand consequences.
